JOB: wg-gesucht-inbox
TASK: Check WG-Gesucht INBOX + UPDATE POST. Use browser (port 9222).

Steps:
1) CHECK INBOX: Go to https://www.wg-gesucht.de/nachrichten.html - check for new messages. Before reporting, read /root/clawd/projects/wg-gesucht/history.json to see what's already been sent. Only report NEW/unread messages.

2) BUMP POST: Go to my active listing and click 'Gesuch aktualisieren' (update request) to push it back to the top of search results.

After checking, update history.json with seen message IDs. Send any new messages/updates to WhatsApp group 120363213979130244@g.us (g-cata-dani).

Context: Vienna apartment, move-in March 15 - April 1, 2026.

When done: Update queue file status to 'completed' with result summary.

TASK: Check Instagram DMs for veddelholzer.com. Use browser (port 9222) to check https://www.instagram.com/direct/inbox/. Before reporting, read /root/clawd/projects/instagram-veddelholzer/history.json - only report NEW messages/requests. Look for collaboration inquiries, people interested in product packages for content. After checking, update history.json with seen conversation IDs. Send summary to WhatsApp group 120363213979130244@g.us (g-cata-dani).

JOB: wg-gesucht-search
TASK: SEARCH for new apartments on WG-Gesucht Vienna. Use browser (port 9222) to search https://www.wg-gesucht.de/wohnungen-in-Wien.96.2.1.0.html (Zwischenmiete). Before reporting, read /root/clawd/projects/wg-gesucht/history.json - only report NEW listings not in seenListings. Check availability dates match March 15 - April 1, 2026. After checking, update history.json with new listing IDs. Send promising listings to WhatsApp group 120363213979130244@g.us (g-cata-dani).

When done: Update queue file status to 'completed' with result summary.

---
JOB: tiktok-rivoara-warmup
TASK: TikTok session for Rivoara (Germany). Use browser (port 9222) to open https://www.tiktok.com.

‚ö†Ô∏è TIKTOK ONLY ‚Äî All research happens ON TikTok. No Google searches, no web articles, no Amazon. Stay in the app.

Tasks:
1) WARMUP: Scroll For You page 10-15 min, watch videos fully, like good content, follow 1-2 German beauty creators
2) SCOUT TRENDS: Find viral formats, hooks, sounds FOR Rivoara content (shower filters, skincare, hair care) ‚Äî by watching what's performing on TikTok
3) SCOUT INFLUENCERS: Find potential product seeding candidates ON TikTok. Key criteria:
   - Aesthetic young women with GOOD HAIR AND SKIN
   - Beauty-focused content (skincare, haircare, routines, GRWM)
   - Quality content potential (matters more than followers)
   - SMALLER ACCOUNTS PREFERRED (500-5k ideal) ‚Äî more likely to accept free product, won't ask for payment
   - 5k+ often expect money, skip unless exceptional
   - German/DACH preferred

For promising candidates, add to /root/clawd/projects/rivoara/influencer-prospects.md with tier (S/A/B), handle, FULL URL (https://www.tiktok.com/@handle), approx followers, niche, and why they're a good fit.

Search ON TIKTOK: #germanbeauty #skincare #Duschfilter #Hautpflege #Haarpflege #GRWM #selfcare #bathroomroutine

Update /root/clawd/projects/tiktok-rivoara/history.json after session.

If you find good influencer prospects, send summary to WhatsApp group 120363422731792463@g.us (g-forelox-cult).
üìé IMPORTANT: In WhatsApp messages, always include FULL CLICKABLE URLs (https://www.tiktok.com/@handle) ‚Äî not just @handle text.

When done: Update queue file status to 'completed' with result summary.

üîÑ CRON TASK ‚Äî Use queue system!

2. Spawn a sub-agent with sessions_spawn to handle it
3. Reply NO_REPLY (don't block main session)

---
JOB: tiktok-rivoara-trends
TASK: Find viral BEAUTY trends that Rivoara could adapt for shower filter content. Use browser (port 9222).

‚ö†Ô∏è TIKTOK ONLY ‚Äî All research happens ON TikTok. No Google, no web searches. Stay in the app.

BEFORE STARTING: Read /root/clawd/projects/rivoara/trends-history.json ‚Äî don't repeat anything already reported.

üéØ THE GOAL: Find trending beauty content/formats, then figure out how Rivoara could adapt them.
DON'T look for shower filter content (it barely exists). DO look for viral beauty trends we can ride.

SEARCH ON TIKTOK (German beauty space):
- Explore/Discover page (Germany)
- #hautpflege #haarpflege #skincare #haircare #GRWM #beautytok
- Hair transformation, glow up, before/after content
- Skincare routines, "was ich bereue" (regrets), "game changer" content
- Viral sounds in beauty niche
- Comments: what are people asking about? what problems do they mention?

FOR EACH PROMISING TREND, THINK:
- What's the format/hook that makes it work?
- How could Rivoara adapt this for shower filter content?
- What angle connects it naturally? (hair health, skin clarity, water quality, etc.)

S-TIER CRITERIA:
1. Actually viral in Germany (high engagement, trending)
2. Rivoara can ADAPT it (not forced, natural connection possible)
3. Fits premium Rivoara aesthetic
4. Fresh ‚Äî not in trends-history.json

OUTPUT (only if S-tier found):
- The trend/format + example videos
- Why it's viral (the hook)
- HOW Rivoara could execute it (specific idea)
- Trending sound if applicable

MAX 1 trend per day. If nothing S-tier: SEND NOTHING. No 'nothing found' message.

Send to WhatsApp 120363422731792463@g.us (g-forelox-cult) ONLY if you have something worth sharing.
üìé Include full TikTok URLs in WhatsApp messages.

AFTER: Update trends-history.json with reported trend (if any).

When done: Update queue file status to 'completed' with result summary.

Valentine's Day is in 2 DAYS. If you haven't booked a dinner reservation for Your Amazonic Queen yet, do it NOW. She wants to eat out ‚Äî that's her thing. Also: groom yourself. She likes eating but not eating hair. Don't mess this up.
Random thought ‚Äî Valentine's Day is a couple weeks away. Might want to start thinking about where to take Your Amazonic Queen for dinner.
Valentine's is two weeks out. Have you thought about where to take Your Amazonic Queen for dinner? She loves eating out ‚Äî find somewhere nice.
Friendly reminder ‚Äî Feb 14 is coming. Good restaurants book up fast for Valentine's. Make a reservation for Your Amazonic Queen now.
One week until Valentine's Day. Got a dinner reservation for Your Amazonic Queen yet? Don't leave it to the last minute.
Valentine's Day is Saturday. If you haven't booked dinner for Your Amazonic Queen, do it TODAY. She wants to eat out, not get objects.
